extShortDesc.message: Makes it easy to login as another user in Salesforce. Maintains the page currently being viewed.

popupShowAllColumns.description: Popup setting to show all columns

popupShowSomeColumns.description: Popup setting to show only first three columns

popupSettingViewSelection.description: Popup setting name to set Salesforce view to show in the popup

popupSettingShowColumns.description: Popup setting name to set if all or some columns should be shown

popupSettingFilter.description: Popup setting name for filtering users in table (for eg. with the name)

popupSettingOnlyShowUserWithLogin.message: Show Only Users With Login Link:
